original_title: Judge Sobitha Rajakaruna sworn in as CA Acting President
original_body_lines: Court of Appeal Judge Sobitha Rajakaruna was sworn in as the Acting President of the Court of Appeal before President Ranil Wickremesinghe today, the President's Media Division (PMD) said.
Meanwhile, High Court Judge M.C.B. Sanjeeva Morais took oaths as a Court of Appeal Judge before the President.
